dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Kazakhstan is in for a scorcher on Thursday, May 15th, according to Kazhydromet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Kazakhstan is in for a scorcher on Thursday, May fifteenth, according to Kazhydromet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Thursday, May 15, hot weather is expected to dominate much of Kazakhstan. Thunderstorms and strong winds are possible in some cities, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, I was just looking at that. Some places are gonna be absolutely baking—like, Kyzylorda is expecting up to 43 degrees Celsius during the day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, I was just looking at that. Some places are gonna be absolutely baking-like, Kyzylorda is expecting up to forty three degrees Celsius during the day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kyzylorda " Slight cloudiness, no precipitation. SE wind turning W 9"14 m/s. +21¦+23ÂC at night, extreme heat +41¦+43ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Forty-three? That's extreme heat for sure. And it's not just the heat, some areas might get thunderstorms and strong winds too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Forty-three? That's extreme heat for sure. And it's not just the heat, some areas might get thunderstorms and strong winds too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thunderstorms and strong winds are possible in some cities, according to Kazhydromet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, like Petropavlovsk is supposed to have thunderstorms and gusts up to 23 meters per second. That's pretty intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, like Petropavlovsk is supposed to have thunderstorms and gusts up to twenty three meters per second. That's pretty intense.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Petropavlovsk " Cloudy, rain and thunderstorms. SE wind 15"20 m/s, gusts up to 23 m/s during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Astana's looking a bit milder, partly cloudy with highs around 34 to 36, which is still really warm for them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Astana's looking a bit milder, partly cloudy with highs around thirty four to thirty six, which is still really warm for them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. Southeast wind 7"12 m/s. Temperature: +15¦+17ÂC at night, extreme heat +34¦+36ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then you've got coastal Aktau, where it's only gonna be like 23 degrees max—much more comfortable, but they've got those strong wind shifts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then you've got coastal Aktau, where it's only gonna be like twenty three degrees max-much more comfortable, but they've got those strong wind shifts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktau " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. NW wind shifting to NE 7"12 m/s, gusts up to 15"18 m/s at night. +16¦+18ÂC at night, +21¦+23ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the northwest turning northeast, gusts up to 18 m/s at night. Sounds a bit blustery.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the northwest turning northeast, gusts up to eighteen meters per second at night. Sounds a bit blustery.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktau " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. NW wind shifting to NE 7"12 m/s, gusts up to 15"18 m/s at night.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how varied it is across the country. Shymkent and Turkestan are also hitting the high 30s, even low 40s.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how varied it is across the country. Shymkent and Turkestan are also hitting the high 30s, even low 40s.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shymkent " Slight cloudiness, no precipitation. South wind 3"8 m/s. +17¦+19ÂC at night, +36¦+38ÂC during the day. Turkestan " Slight cloudiness, no precipitation. S wind 8"13 m/s. +19¦+21ÂC at night, extreme heat +39¦+41ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then up north, places like Kokshetau are only in the high 20s. Big range.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then up north, places like Kokshetau are only in the high 20s. Big range.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kokshetau " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. SE wind 9"14 m/s. +12¦+14ÂC at night, +29¦+31ÂC during the day.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. You wouldn't wanna be in Zhezkazgan or Turkestan without some serious AC.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. You wouldn't wanna be in Zhezkazgan or Turkestan without some serious A C.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: No kidding. And with those southeast winds blowing steady in a lot of regions, it might feel even hotter.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No kidding. And with those southeast winds blowing steady in a lot of regions, it might feel even hotter.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Astana " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. Southeast wind 7"12 m/s. Zhezkazgan " Partly cloudy, no precipitation. SE wind 5"10 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: At least most places aren't expecting rain, though—except for a few spots with overnight showers.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least most places aren't expecting rain, though-except for a few spots with overnight showers.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Aktobe " Partly cloudy, occasional rain and thunderstorms at night. W and NW wind 7"12 m/s, gusts up to 15 m/s at night. Uralsk " Partly cloudy, rain and thunderstorms at night. W wind 9"14 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True. Overall, just a classic hot, dry pattern for mid-May there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True. Overall, just a classic hot, dry pattern for mid-May there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you grateful for shade and cold drinks, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you grateful for shade and cold drinks, honestly.
